item.title: Forest
item.description: Forest Enter the forest and discover its mysteries... Description Forest is a 3D interactive environment. This project is the result of a collaboration between programmers and artists to explore Tech Art. Forest by Prog'z Enter the forest and discover its mysteries... Play See code See more Tools Unreal Engine 4.26.2 Perforce Microsoft Teams Members Thomas Dallard Valentine Collino William Nardone Loïc Rinjard My work Water material Underwater effect Leaf particles Procedural rotten leaves generation Stylistic fog Light management (light shaft, rotation…) Birds Crack effects Some transitions
